CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Join Group or Community stage positioned above or below the Share Content stage?
SRP.A: The Join Group or Community stage is positioned {below} the Share Content stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Follow Account?
VE.A: The value of stage Follow Account is {156}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {266}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Like or Comment, with a value of {473}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Join Group or Community, with a value of {124}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Share Content to stage Follow Account?
SC.A: Decreased by {110} Million Users from stage Share Content to stage Follow Account.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Like or Comment to stage Share Content?
SC.A: Decreased by {207} Million Users from stage Like or Comment to stage Share Content.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community?
SC.A: Decreased by {32} Million Users from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 211? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Like or Comment} stage has {473}, the {Share Content} stage has {266}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 140? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Join Group or Community} stage has {124}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 140 and 211? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Like or Comment to Share Content, or from stage Share Content to Follow Account?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Like or Comment} to {Share Content} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Share Content to Follow Account?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to {Follow Account} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Like or Comment to Share Content, from stage Share Content to Follow Account, or from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Like or Comment} to stage {Share Content} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Like or Comment} and {Share Content} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Follow Account} and {Join Group or Community} stages.
